channel.title: How to Change the NPC's HP
channel.description: Title says it all. Anyone know how to? npc.cfg does not do it if thats your answer

item.title: How to Change the NPC's HP
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

[quote=“life lover7, post:6, topic:314111”]Go into your npc.config file on your source. It should have these going all the way down like this:

npc = 0 Hans 0 0
npc = 1 Man 2 100
npc = 2 Man 2 7
npc = 3 Man 2 7
npc = 4 Woman 2 0
npc = 5 Woman 2 7
npc = 6 Woman 2 7
npc = 7 Farmer 7 3000
npc = 8 Thief 16 17
npc = 9 Guard 21 22

the last number is the npc’s hp level, change it to what you want.[/quote]

he said he already did that and it didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change the NPC's HP

item.title: How to Change the NPC's HP
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

Go into your npc.config file on your source. It should have these going all the way down like this:

npc = 0 Hans 0 0
npc = 1 Man 2 100
npc = 2 Man 2 7
npc = 3 Man 2 7
npc = 4 Woman 2 0
npc = 5 Woman 2 7
npc = 6 Woman 2 7
npc = 7 Farmer 7 3000
npc = 8 Thief 16 17
npc = 9 Guard 21 22

the last number is the npc’s hp level, change it to what you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change the NPC's HP

item.title: How to Change the NPC's HP
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:4, topic:314111”]NOTE: I AM NOT ADVERTISING

im pretty sure i didnt read in-correctly im using The Last Pure

Here is an example of the npc.cfg

npc = 1		Man				2	184

it doesn’t change the hp when i change there[/quote]
delete the spaces inbetween

npc = 1(tab)Man(tab)2(tab)184

Read full topic
